alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:42PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carbon County through 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Battle Mountain, or 50 miles east of Rawlins, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Battle Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Shirley Basin
